arts.ttl: Cesc Fabregas responds to Man United's transfer interest in teenage winger admired by Ruben Amorim
arts.sum: The 19-year-old winger, who represents Senegal at international level, has made an instant impact in Italy since joining Como from Real Betis in January in a £10.5million deal.

arts.ttl: Como against Torino to all but secure survival
arts.sum: Como have drawn their last two league games at the Sinigaglia (against Venezia and Empoli, both 1-1), the last time they recorded three consecutive home draws in Serie A dates to the period between December 1987 and January 1988 (the first of which was against Torino). Como won their last home match against Torino in Serie A: 1-0 on 24 May 2003 with a goal by Mirko Benin; the Lariani have recorded two clean sheets in their last three games at the Sinigaglia against the Granata in the topflight, as many as in their previous 10 games at this stadium against them in the tournament.

arts.ttl: Weston McKennie among 13 footballers probed for illegal gambling in Italy
arts.sum: Weston McKennie and 12 others are under investigation for illegal betting in Italy. The probe follows revelations from Sandro Tonali and Nicolò Fagioli, who faced bans for gambling. No evidence links others to match bets, but fines may follow for online poker use.

arts.ttl: Man Utd sent hands-off transfer message by Cesc Fabregas over £40m-rated winger
arts.sum: Manchester United have recently been linked with a swoop for Como forward Assane Diao but Cesc Fabregas has little interest in entertaining a sale

arts.ttl: Man Utd Transfer News: Cesc Fabregas talks up €40m deal for Ruben Amorim target Assane Diao
arts.sum: In keeping with his previous comments, Fabregas insisted that Como are looking to build a project that is attractive to young players but admitted that the Serie A side would at least have to consider a sale should Man Utd, or any other club, offer big money. Como boss Cesc Fabregas has addressed the speculation surrounding Manchester United target Assane Diao .

arts.ttl: Cesc Fabregas speaks on Manchester United’s interest in Como’s Assane Diao
arts.sum: In their first season in Serie A, Como have given an excellent account of themselves. Led by Cesc Fabregas, the side sit 13th and are under no risk of getting…
